I gained 331,689 followers this year, or 〜900 followers/day. If I had to start all over again, I would:

✦ Be edgy. Be different.
✦ Don't be personal. Be useful instead.
✦ Use AI. Not to be lazier, but a better writer.

Growing an account is all about phases:

→ 0-1,000: comment 100x per day, every day.
→ 1,000-10,000: post every day, weekend included.
→ 10,000-100,000: be known for one specific niche.
→ 100,000-1M: if I think of [niche], I think of you.
→ 1M+: build trillion-$ companies, like Microsoft.

I wrote a much more extensive guide on how to go from 0 → 10,000 followers at how-to-lkdn.ai.
